quote: I like how steady the work in television is. Films, they're hard to come by. They're elusive. I've done a couple, independently financed. You do them, and maybe a few people will see them.

I figured I could either be out selling condos in Miami, or I could move to L.A. and chase after that elusive actor's job.

Everything is elusive in Proust because nothing is ever certain.
